body: Came here for reread after year and half. Still best doujin on the site.
im fucking crying whatthe fuck is this
Screw you guys, I’m going home
BEST FUCKING DOUJIN IN THE WHOLE WORLD YOU CAN'T CONVINCE ME OTHERWISE 42,069/10
the doujin that gets you confusing and to not really expect much and then laughing your ass off, cause it's actually a masterpiece omg wtffffffffff. 146/10
I can’t tell if this is a joke, or truth but 100/10

Ive never read a better doujin. It pulls on all the right heart strings and makes you experience combinations of emotions you didn't even know could go together. Confusion, sadness, appreciation, and slight arousal are feelings you WILL have hit you all at once when reading this masterpiece. The art has is an antiquity and must be remembered, for the author has poured their soul into it. Please continue making these, 10/10
10/10 this was by far the most beautiful, brilliant work of art I have ever gotten the pleasure of seeing, the plot was all you ever needed. Overall the best thing i ever did see

The love and care what helped create this masterpiece, brought tears to my eyes. The art is truly outstanding. The dialog was carefully crafted with blood and work from the author. But that is not all. I haven't yet addresed the most important part of it all..... the story, no complaints there..... just majestical. Overall I will give this a 11/10 for curing my ball cancer.
